Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2017...
Traded from Atlanta to New York on 5/1/2017 (Going to ATL: 3B Motokurou Tadayuki, P William Kinch, P Ronald Lebowitz. Going to NY: CF Issac Scott)...
Injured on 8/20/2017 with a Pulled Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/12/2018, off Bill Birdwell (BOS)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 8/16/2018...
Drove in 8 runs against Kansas City on 7/20/2019...
Injured on 9/7/2020 with a Broken Ribs, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/20/2021 with a Broken Finger, out for 4 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $871,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/11/2022 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York to Detroit on 7/10/2022 (Going to DET: C Issac Scott, P Jason Saterfiel. Going to NY: SS Robert Guerriero, P Deangelo Montejano, C Leo Vinyals)...
Injured on 9/15/2022 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,564,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Detroit to St. Louis (C) on 4/21/2023 (Going to DET: P Thomas Svoboda, CF Rodney Mundy, P Silvio Sanchez. Going to STL: CF Issac Scott)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,650,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Montreal on 7/9/2024...
8/4/2024: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $15,475,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2024...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 6/23/2025...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 6/4/2026...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2026, hitting .409 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
